attributes.action: enable UK citizens to have easy access to information about the EU, by prominent links on the directgov website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many UK citizens don't know much about the EU's functions/ services/ successes/ failures, aside from anecdotal tabloid stories about bendy bananas. The Europe Direct information portal is comprehensive but little known - a link to it through the successful directgov site would promote transparency and participation, as well as general awareness.

rejection.details:
Hi there

In the first instance can we suggest that you contact the Direct Gov web team. You can do this via the following link:

http://www.direct.gov.uk/en/Hl1/Help/ContactUs/ContactUsForm/DG_000714

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
